articles.title: Yahoo Finance
articles.content: Stock markets mostly struggled on Tuesday while gold and silver prices rebounded in fresh volatile trading. The price of gold climbed more than seven percent but later traded near $4,950 per ounce. Last week it reached a record-high close to $5,600 before tumbling. Gold and silver prices have been on a tear in recent months, benefitting from being seen as a safe haven investments...
